title: NZ Herald: «Peters skewers Russia in UN speech, blames both Hamas, Israel for ‘misery’» - Related news - Newstral.com
text: Newstral Article [NZ Herald](/en/sources/229) on 2024-09-27 00:51 Peters skewers Russia in UN speech, blames both Hamas, Israel for ‘misery’ Related news [Watch: Irritated Peters stops UN speech, demands room to 'keep quiet’](https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/winston-peters-stops-united-nations-speech-calls-for-room-to-be-quiet/YU2TF5EF2VET7AVZBYCBXT3CA4/)[NZ Herald](/en/sources/229),,,,[Russia envoy denies atrocities, blames West for Ukraine’s misery](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2023/3/3/russia-envoy-denies-atrocities-blames-west-for-ukraines-misery)[Al Jazeera](/en/sources/40),,,,[Trump skewers aides in joke-filled speech](http://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-43276466)[BBC](/en/sources/30),,,,[Daily Show's Jon Stewart skewers everyone involved in 'Speech-gate'](http://www.jpost.com/Israel-News/Politics-And-Diplomacy/Daily-Shows-Jon-Stewart-skewers-everyone-involved-in-Speech-gate-392877)[The Jerusalem Post (JPost.com)](/en/sources/277)[Watch live: NZ First leader Winston Peters delivers State of the Nation speech](https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/nz-first-leader-winston-peters-delivers-state-of-the-nation-speech/4EOIMT3VD5AQXMVLSFWQRU3X6M/)[NZ Herald](/en/sources/229)[Israelis watched Netanyahu's Congress speech closely.
